title: sattiya jyOtiyai
sahitya:
sattiya jyOtiyai bhakti sheivOm vArIr samarasa sanmArga sabhaiyinil sErIr


anupallavi

  citta calanaminri dhyAnattil Unri cintanaikk-amudamAi vandu vandinikkum


caraNam    jAti mata bhEda sAttira gOttira saNDaigaLai viDuttu sAdhanattAlE
Adip-paramporuLin aruLinai nADiyE Atma nEyattil anaivarum kUDiyE
